title: sintonservice
author: sintonservice
content: Hello, we are Sinton Services. We are located in the Dallas/Richardson area in Texas.We offer repair services for Bitcoin miners, including:-HB S9/L3++-PSU APW 3,7-HB17&19 SERIES-HB AVALON SERVICES-HB WHATSMINERS-HB L7WHY CHOOSE US?- We offer the best pricing and accept bulk - Repair capacity: 50 miners or 400 hash boards per day - 14 days warranty for PSU & HB If you are interested, please contact us and we'd be happy to help:sintonservices@gmail.comhttps://www.jinhexin.tech/999 E Arapaho Rd #360, Richardson, TX, 75081
